Tribute Page

Margaret Brainard Hamilton

Margaret Hamilton standing beside her code that helped take man to the moon

A brief timeline of Margaret Hamilton

  • 1936, August 17 - born in Paoli, Indiana
  • 1958 - graduated with a BA in Mathematics with a minor in Philosophy.
  • 1959 Began working in the meteorology department at MIT.
  • 1961 Worked on a program for the U.S. Air Force to search for unfriendly aircraft.
  • 1964 Along with her MIT team, started working on the Apollo flight software.

"Looking back, we were the luckiest people in the world. There was no choice but to be pioneers; no time to be beginners."

Learn more on Margaret Hamilton's Wikipedia entry
